name: Divyansh

personalProjects.title: ArtiePIX (Full-stack AI Image Generator)
personalProjects.description: A stable diffusion prompt using RapidAPI to generate custom AI images. Features user authentication, advanced search, responsive UI, and comment section. Deployed as a standalone product.

personalProjects.title: Chrome Extension
personalProjects.description: Built with Manifest V3, TypeScript, Firebase, BlocC, and Clean Architecture. Uses a micro-frontend approach, integrates with multiple web apps, and can capture user interactions. Designed for real-time usage analytics.

personalProjects.title: Chat Application (MERN, Socket.io, DaisyUI)
personalProjects.description: Real-time chat application with the MERN stack and Socket.io. Features a user-friendly interface using DaisyUI, user authentication with JWT, and MongoDB for data persistence.

personalProjects.title: Time & Travel Planning Website (MERN)
personalProjects.description: Full-stack MERN application with user authentication, trip-rating features, RESTful APIs, and cost estimation for travel planning. Provides front-end/back-end sync and dynamic trip recommendations.
